actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week commencing October 7, 1984 as National Port Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning October 7, 1984, as National Port Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week commencing October 7, 1984 as National Port Week.
